title: New: Gold Panda – Trust
body:
From the sounds of this new cut from **Gold Panda**, he’s been digging hard on **Flying Lotus** recently, with _Trust_ showcasing the UK beatmaestro’s most choppy production to date.

Far less hook based than his debut LP, _Trust_ is taken from his as yet untitled forthcoming EP, and was premiered on Mary Anne Hobbs’ show last night. Check it out below.

Far less hook based than his debut LP, Trust is taken from his as yet untitled forthcoming EP, and was premiered on Mary Anne Hobbs’ show \[…\]
